review: We've been a Roku family for years, and our Roku devices have served us well.  However, more and more of my digital content is purchased through Amazon (to say nothing of their huge, growing free Prime video content), so it just made sense to try out Amazon's hardware.  I'm glad I did.  This device is fast, easy to control/navigate through, easy to customize via downloadable apps, has a great remote control app for my phone...I could go on and on.  We own both a Fire TV and a Fire Stick.  They're both great streaming devices.Bonus: the certified refurbished unit appeared brand new.  Why pay the brand new price when Amazon fully stands behind the less pricey refurb model?
